{"step_by_step_thinking": "Based on the information provided in the relevant documents, Zanubrutinib is not a first-generation BTK inhibitor approved by the US Food and Drug Administration (FDA). It is described as a second-generation BTK inhibitor and has been approved by the FDA for the treatment of mantle cell lymphoma (MCL), Waldenström macroglobulinemia (WM), and marginal zone lymphoma (MZL).", "answer_choice": "B"}
